body:
Hi Jesper!

Thank you! As I mentioned [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/analysis-view-problem?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A853043&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) there are few bugs in the view component that should be fixed! I also have to write a post to discuss how the parameter component works. The result that you get though looks way wrong! That 0 values does make no sense to me. Are you using the locked version? I fixed the component once but only for the unlocked version.

If you still want to use the view component and cannot wait until I fix it all upload your definition so I can take a look.

Best,

Mostapha
